company_info.Company Description: Hiring for Medical Representatives & Area Managers for all south Delhi and west delhi in General & Speciality segments.The incumbent would be responsible for following roles-Medical Representative-The incumbent would be responsible for following roles-1. Flair of Sales.5. Go-Getter & having Smart approach.
